sentence.text: These results imply that PPI might be modulated by four genotypes - catecholamine catabolic process rs4680 (primarily in males), glutamate receptor signaling pathway rs1027599, negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II rs9960767, and positive regulation of cell death rs385440 - indicating a role of these gene variations in the development of early information processing deficits in schizophrenia.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
